creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: two white panels stitched together; patterns in supplementary weft patterning:  at the center, double eagle motif (red, orange, yellow); one edge is hemmed with red and purple stitches; four birds along the hem; central randa in purple and red
title: Cloth (tzute)
